CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 15, 1952, pg. 6, reads: "Kennard Pool to be Improved - Renovation and improvement of Kennard Pool will cost $100,000.  A new bath house will be built and the pool will be renovated, substituting slides (more suitable for the youngsters who normally use the pool) for the box which formerly served as a diving board. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Double exposure: demolition of building for renovations at Kennard swimming pool, Hill District; men standing with towels over shoulders
CatSubject_tab: Demolition--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Swimming pools--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Kennard Field (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Hill District (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Construction and demolition debris--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Construction equipment--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
